project1.title: SWGOH Counters
project1.subtitle: NSS Front-End Capstone
project1.description: A Companion app for the mobile game Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes, SWGOH Counters, built with React.js and using the Google Sheets API as a server.  This application is used as a reference guide for players to look up which teams are best to use against teams they are battling.  This app has an average of over 35,000 users and 340,000 pageviews per month.

project2.title: SWGOH Squad Builder
project2.subtitle: NSS Front-End Capstone
project2.description: A squad planning and management app built with React.js and utilizing Firebase for database CRUD implementation.

project3.title: Venns Against Humanity
project3.subtitle: Venn Diagram app built with React.js and D3.js
project3.description: An app built with React.js and D3.js that generates random Cards Against Humanity cards and places them in a Venn diagram.

project4.title: Catch of the Day
project4.subtitle: Seafood app build with React.js
project4.description: A seafood store app where a user can add, edit, and delete orders from a seafood restaurant.

project5.title: Cashew Outside
project5.subtitle: Group Project using Firebase for CRUD
project5.description: A dashboard that a user can use to keep track of news articles, messages, events, and a diary.

project6.title: Arnold Flix
project6.subtitle: Movie app using Firebase for CRUD
project6.description:
A page that allows users to keep track of all of their favorite Arnold Schwarzenegger movies.

Features include adding, editing, deleting, rating, and adding to a Watchlist.

project7.title: Fling's Landing
project7.subtitle: Group messaging app project
project7.description: A Game of Thrones themed messaging app.
